Package com.sdklite.aapt

Provides parser and writer for Android assets packaging

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Chunk
    Android asset chunk
    ChunkType
    The types definition of Chunk
    Constants
    Constants definition
    ValueType
    The types definition of ResourceValue
    Visitor
    Chunk visitor
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Aapt
    The AAPT Utility
    AbstractParser
    Abstraction of binary file parser
    Build
    The build properties
    ChunkHeader
    The basic Chunk
    ChunkOutputStream
    The output stream for Chunk writing
    ChunkParser
    Represents a recursive descent parser for Android resource file parsing
    ChunkReconcileVisitor  
    ResourceName
    The resource name
    ResourcesVisitor  
    ResourceTable
    Represents the android resource table
    ResourceTable.DynamicReferenceTable  
    ResourceTable.Entry
    This is the beginning of information about an entry in the resource table.
    ResourceTable.Map
    A single name/value mapping that is part of a complex resource entry.
    ResourceTable.MapEntry
    Extended form of a ResourceTable.Entry for map entries, defining a parent map resource from which to inherit values.
    ResourceTable.PackageGroup  
    ResourceTable.ValueEntry  
    ResourceValue
    Representation of a value in a resource, supplying type information.
    Revision
    A Revision which distinguishes between x and x.0, x.0.0, x.y.0, etc; it basically keeps track of the precision of the revision string.
    SimpleVisitor  
    StringPool
    Definition for a pool of strings.
    StringPool.Span  
    StringPool.Style  
    StringsVisitor  
    SymbolParser
    The parser of aapt-generated text symbols file R.txt
    Symbols
    Representation of text symbols
    Symbols.Entry  
    Symbols.Styleable  
    Symbols.Type  
    SymbolWriter  
    Xml
    Binary XML resource
    XmlVisitor  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Revision.Precision  
    Revision.PreviewComparison
    Indicates how to compare the preview field in Revision.compareTo(Revision, PreviewComparison)
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AaptException
    AAPT exception
